name: ONE WAY APOCALYPSE
description:
You only wanted to go shopping and get away from those annoying FFF protesters.

But oh my, of course an apocalypse had to break down on earth right this instance.

You were safe - but somehow all the protesters turned into brainless zombies.

And of course they want to eat you.

At least you have dozens of one way usage items…can you survive?

IMPORTANT: YOU CAN FETCH ITEMS FROM THE SHELF AT THE BASE OF THE SCREEN.
